actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to certain agricultural hand harvest laborers.

summary.text: Exempts children under the age of 12 years employed as agricultural hand harvest laborers from the provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act provided the Secretary of Labor finds that (1) such individual is employed for less than 13 weeks per year and is not employed during regular school hours, and (2) such employment is not deleterious to health or well being.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to certain agricultural hand harvest laborers.
